PM Đukanović: 9y ago, #Montenegro embarked on this journey by joining PfP. Today, we proudly receive a #NATO membership invitation.
PM Đukanović: This is a historic day for #Montenegro. The most important after the 2006 referendum. https://t.co/kT9bnUYxh7
PM Đukanović: We are thankful for NATO member-States’ and NATO administration’s invaluable help and support during all these years.
PM Đukanović: We also owe a special thanks to the members of the Diplomatic Corps in Podgorica. This is our joint success.
PM Đukanović: #NATO invite result of serious work on meeting strategic goals of membership in NATO and EU. https://t.co/5DgDCmi59F
PM Đukanović: Thanks also to political parties, CSOs, media, business, academia all the stakeholders who contributed to discussions #NATO.
PM Đukanović: Inviting #Montenegro big day for W. Balkans. I believe this is wind in sails for reform and integration processes in region.
PM Đukanović: All of our neighbours, regardless of their attitude towards #NATO, want the Western Balkans to be more stable and secure.
PM Đukanović: Invitation not understood as mere recognition, but a strong impulse for continuous work on the implementation of reforms.
PM Đukanović: Even today, when we are celebrating, we think of tomorrow, commitments that can't wait. This is the formula of our success.
